actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the civil service retirement law to increase the retirement benefits of referees in bankruptcy, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the retirement benefits of referees in bankruptcy, and provides for their automatic retirement at the age of 70 years, or at the time of completion of 5 years service after age 70.

titles.title: A bill to amend the civil service retirement law to increase the retirement benefits of referees in bankruptcy, and for other purposes.
